entry.title: Éclade de moules
entry.summary:
Discover the French coastal tradition of éclade de moules, where mussels are cooked under pine needles for a smoky flavour. Follow our concise guide to recreate this unique seafood dish in your back garden - a perfect autumnal activity. 

More
entry.content: Discover the French coastal tradition of éclade de moules, where mussels are cooked under pine needles for a smoky flavour. Follow our concise guide to recreate this unique seafood dish in your back garden - a perfect autumnal activity.

entry.title: How to make killer crack salmon muffins
entry.summary:
Watch our co-founder Robin as he channels the creativity of Instagram star Stella Drivas, aka @hungry.happens, and crafts his take on these irresistible killer crack salmon muffins!

More
entry.content: Watch our co-founder Robin as he channels the creativity of Instagram star Stella Drivas, aka @hungry.happens, and crafts his take on these irresistible killer crack salmon muffins!

entry.title: How to make sushi
entry.summary:
Watch how to make a delicious set of maki rolls from scratch as Yuki goes through the steps to show Robin how to make her very special Salmon Uramaki.

More
entry.content: Watch how to make a delicious set of maki rolls from scratch as Yuki goes through the steps to show Robin how to make her very special Salmon Uramaki.

entry.title: How to Pan Fry Salmon
entry.summary:
Have a perfectly cooked salmon fillet, complete with crisp skin, ready in under 10 minutes. Serve with a side of salad or some buttery, seasonal green veg.

More
entry.content: Have a perfectly cooked salmon fillet, complete with crisp skin, ready in under 10 minutes. Serve with a side of salad or some buttery, seasonal green veg.

entry.title: How to Pan Fry Scallops
entry.summary:
These popular molluscs take no more than 4-5 minutes to pan-fry to perfection, making scallops the perfect fast food. You can enjoy these meaty morsels of sweet flesh with a hint of the sea in no time. 

More
entry.content: These popular molluscs take no more than 4-5 minutes to pan-fry to perfection, making scallops the perfect fast food. You can enjoy these meaty morsels of sweet flesh with a hint of the sea in no time.

entry.title: How to Shuck Oysters like Robin
entry.summary:
With over 20 years in the oyster business our founder Robin Hancock has shucked a fair few oysters in his time. As more oysters than ever are being eaten at home, he often gets asked "how to shuck oysters".  If you don't know how to open oysters safely and easily, you will in no time after watching Robin's "how to shuck" video.

You can join Robin in his family kitchen to learn more and shuck along side him in one of our oyster masterclass that are now available online!

More
entry.content:
With over 20 years in the oyster business our founder Robin Hancock has shucked a fair few oysters in his time. As more oysters than ever are being eaten at home, he often gets asked "how to shuck oysters".  If you don't know how to open oysters safely and easily, you will in no time after watching Robin's "how to shuck" video.

You can join Robin in his family kitchen to learn more and shuck along side him in one of our oyster masterclass that are now available online!

entry.title: How to Create Fish Pie with a Twist by Emma Hatcher
entry.summary:
With an easy-to-follow recipe created by Emma Hatcher @shecanteatwhat you can learn how to create a Fish Pie with a Twist with a velvety, golden filling spiked with Indian spices and topped with a gluten-free puff pastry shell lid.

More
entry.content: With an easy-to-follow recipe created by Emma Hatcher @shecanteatwhat you can learn how to create a Fish Pie with a Twist with a velvety, golden filling spiked with Indian spices and topped with a gluten-free puff pastry shell lid.

entry.title: How to Make Seafood Pancakes
entry.summary:
Enjoy Pancake Day with a twist! Follow our foolproof recipe with one of our Founders, Robin, who shows you how to make seafood pancakes made with our sustainably pot-caught Fresh White Crab Meat. Perfect for those who have less of a sweet tooth, but still want to enjoy a delicious day!

More
entry.content: Enjoy Pancake Day with a twist! Follow our foolproof recipe with one of our Founders, Robin, who shows you how to make seafood pancakes made with our sustainably pot-caught Fresh White Crab Meat. Perfect for those who have less of a sweet tooth, but still want to enjoy a delicious day!

entry.title: How to create the perfect Fruits de Mer
entry.summary:
Join our founders Ben and Robin at home as they give you a step-by-step guide of how to prepare a Fruits de Mer seafood platter the Wright way. A 'plateau de fruits de mer' is perfect for sharing with family and friends to celebrate all occasions

More
entry.content:
Join our founders Ben and Robin 'At Home' as they give you a step-by-step guide of how to prepare a Fruits de Mer seafood platter the Wright Brothers way. A 'plateau de fruits de mer' is perfect for sharing with family and friends to celebrate all occasions.

Shop Fruits de Mer - Seafood Platter with Free delivery available direct to your door.

entry.title: How to Shuck Oysters like a Pro
entry.summary:
With more oysters being eaten 'At Home' than ever, we often get asked exactly "how to shuck oysters". Our Oyster Master is here to show you how to prepare your oysters like a pro. If you don't know how to open oysters safely and easily, you will in no time after watching this "how to shuck" video.

entry.title: How to cook a Whole Turbot
entry.summary:
Join our founders Ben and Robin at home as they show you a step-by-step guide of how to cook turbot with this quick and tasty roast Turbot recipe with potatoes, fennel and tarragon.
